headline.main: AMERICAN ASSOCIATION FOR THE ADVANCEMENT OF SCIENCE.

docs.snippet: THE American Association for the Advancement of Science is modeled after the British association, which met last'year at T-ronto, and some account of which was given in THE TIMES'S Illustrated Weekly 2Vlagazine of Aug. 8, 1897,

byline.original: BY WILLIAM HENRY HALE, PH.D., FELLOW OF THE ASSOCIATION.CHARLES DE KAY
